item.description:
There are actually three races on Saturday 24th September. The website for more information is here:

http://endurancekarting.com/events/info2011_limerock_september.asp

 

There are three races on that day - 8 AM, 11 AM, 2PM. Race suits, helmets etc are *NOT* provided - but available for rent. Lap timers are also available for rent. A team can have a maximum of 3 drivers. The cost of a team to race is $450 (so its $150 per head). For that money the team gets a 20 minute practice time and 90 minutes of racing.

 

There is no requirement to form a team before we head there - they will mix and match people if we so desire. For example, if we end up with 7 people williing to go - we can  form two teams of 3 and the last person can just let endurance karting know - so that they can put that person in another 3-person team.

 

The last time we raced - this was a blast and its a great technical track - very different from F1 indoors. There are decreasing radius turns, severely off-camber turns, and wide sweeping turns that require braking finesse - all in all tons of fun at a new and exiciting track. Whats more the karts are superb and a lot less tiring on the hands - so many teams actually sign up for multiple enduros on the same day !

 

But the best part is being inside a real track and seeing real cars racing on a weekend - pretty sweet :)
item.how_to_find_us: Enter the track and meet at the kart track trailer inside limerock park main track
